Key Match Events: Dawid Malan delivered a sensational 140-run innings with 16 boundaries and five massive sixes
Jonny Bairstow contributed a crucial 55 and Joe Root played a pivotal role with a well-constructed 82
Miscellaneous Highlights: England's batting prowess was showcased in a thrilling World Cup league stage match against Bangladesh
Bangladesh displayed commendable resilience in the final 10 overs of the innings
Others: Mahedi Hasan emerged as the standout bowler for Bangladesh with figures of 8-0-71-4
Shoriful Islam made significant contributions by claiming three crucial wickets
